content: Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics, where the nearby Yanqing National Alpine Ski Centre is the the venue for all alpine skiing events. It relies on artificial snow, diverting water from a key Beijing reservoirâ€¦possibly the new norm into the future, raising concerns about water usage and scarcity.
